table.name: article_activity_materialized
table.viewSql: SELECT article_activity_view.id, article_activity_view.title, article_activity_view.created_at, article_activity_view.base_score, article_activity_view.boost_score_1, article_activity_view.boost_score_2, article_activity_view.score FROM article_activity_view;

table.name: article_activity_view
table.viewSql: SELECT scores.id, scores.title, scores.created_at, scores.base_score, scores.boost_score_1, scores.boost_score_2, (((scores.base_score + (scores.boost_score_1)::numeric))::double precision + scores.boost_score_2) AS score FROM ( SELECT article.id, article.title, article.created_at, LEAST(((((0.5 * (COALESCE(cc.comment_12_hrs, (0)::bigint))::numeric) + ((2 * COALESCE(lc1.like_24_hrs, (0)::bigint)))::numeric) * ((2 + pd.post_days))::numeric) / ((1 + pd.post_days))::numeric), (300)::numeric) AS base_score, ((15 * COALESCE(cc.comment_30_mins, (0)::bigint)) + (60 * COALESCE(lc2.like_30_mins, (0)::bigint))) AS boost_score_1, (GREATEST(((120)::double precision - ((2)::double precision * fc.since_comment)), (0)::double precision) + GREATEST(((240)::double precision - ((2)::double precision * fl.since_like)), (0)::double precision)) AS boost_score_2 FROM ((((((article LEFT JOIN ( SELECT comment.article_id, sum(((comment.created_at >= (now() - '12:00:00'::interval)))::integer) AS comment_12_hrs, sum(((comment.created_at >= (now() - '00:30:00'::interval)))::integer) AS comment_30_mins FROM comment GROUP BY comment.article_id) cc ON ((cc.article_id = article.id))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT appreciation.reference_id, sum(appreciation.amount) AS like_24_hrs FROM appreciation WHERE ((appreciation.purpose = 'appreciate'::text) AND (appreciation.created_at >= (now() - '24:00:00'::interval))) GROUP BY appreciation.reference_id) lc1 ON ((lc1.reference_id = article.id))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT appreciation.reference_id, sum(appreciation.amount) AS like_30_mins FROM appreciation WHERE ((appreciation.purpose = 'appreciate'::text) AND (appreciation.created_at >= (now() - '00:30:00'::interval))) GROUP BY appreciation.reference_id) lc2 ON ((lc2.reference_id = article.id))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT article_1.id, (CURRENT_DATE - (article_1.created_at)::date) AS post_days FROM article article_1) pd ON ((pd.id = article.id))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT comment.article_id, (date_part('epoch'::text, (now() - min(comment.created_at))) / (60)::double precision) AS since_comment FROM comment WHERE (comment.created_at >= (now() - '30 days'::interval)) GROUP BY comment.article_id) fc ON ((fc.article_id = article.id))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT appreciation.reference_id, (date_part('epoch'::text, (now() - min(appreciation.created_at))) / (60)::double precision) AS since_like FROM appreciation WHERE ((appreciation.purpose = 'appreciate'::text) AND (appreciation.created_at >= (now() - '30 days'::interval))) GROUP BY appreciation.reference_id) fl ON ((fl.reference_id = article.id)))) scores WHERE (NOT (scores.id IN ( SELECT matters_today.article_id FROM matters_today ORDER BY matters_today.updated_at DESC LIMIT 1)));

table.name: article_count_materialized
table.viewSql: SELECT article_count_view.id, article_count_view.title, article_count_view.comments_total, article_count_view.commenters_7d, article_count_view.commenters_1d, article_count_view.recent_comment_since, article_count_view.score FROM article_count_view;

table.name: article_count_view
table.viewSql: SELECT comment_score.id, comment_score.title, comment_score.comments_total, comment_score.commenters_7d, comment_score.commenters_1d, comment_score.recent_comment_since, ((((((comment_score.comments_total * 1) / 5) + (comment_score.commenters_7d * 10)))::double precision + (((comment_score.commenters_1d * 50))::double precision * CASE WHEN (comment_score.recent_comment_since <= (8100)::double precision) THEN sqrt(((8100)::double precision / comment_score.recent_comment_since)) ELSE (1)::double precision END)) * ( CASE WHEN (comment_score.commenters_7d > 2) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::double precision) AS score FROM ( SELECT article.id, article.title, count(*) AS comments_total, count(DISTINCT CASE WHEN ((now() - comment.created_at) <= '7 days'::interval) THEN comment.author_id ELSE NULL::bigint END) AS commenters_7d, count(DISTINCT CASE WHEN ((now() - comment.created_at) <= '1 day'::interval) THEN comment.author_id ELSE NULL::bigint END) AS commenters_1d, date_part('epoch'::text, (now() - max(comment.created_at))) AS recent_comment_since FROM (article LEFT JOIN comment ON ((article.id = comment.article_id))) WHERE (comment.state = 'active'::text) GROUP BY article.id) comment_score;

table.name: article_interest_materialized
table.viewSql: SELECT article_interest_view.id, article_interest_view.user_id, article_interest_view.score FROM article_interest_view;

table.name: article_interest_view
table.viewSql: WITH tag_interest AS ( SELECT user_tag.tag_id, user_tag.user_id, ((user_tag.count)::numeric / (tag_total.count)::numeric) AS interest FROM (( SELECT article_tag.tag_id, articles.user_id, count(article_tag.tag_id) AS count FROM (( SELECT comment.article_id AS id, comment.author_id AS user_id FROM comment UNION SELECT appreciation.reference_id AS id, appreciation.sender_id AS user_id FROM appreciation) articles JOIN article_tag ON ((article_tag.article_id = articles.id))) WHERE (articles.user_id IS NOT NULL) GROUP BY article_tag.tag_id, articles.user_id) user_tag JOIN ( SELECT count(article_tag.tag_id) AS count, article_tag.tag_id AS id FROM article_tag GROUP BY article_tag.tag_id) tag_total ON ((tag_total.id = user_tag.tag_id))) ), article_interest AS ( SELECT article.id, tag_interest.user_id, sum(tag_interest.interest) AS interest FROM ((article JOIN article_tag ON ((article_tag.article_id = article.id))) JOIN tag_interest ON ((article_tag.tag_id = tag_interest.tag_id))) WHERE (article.state = 'active'::text) GROUP BY article.id, tag_interest.user_id ) SELECT article_value_materialized.id, article_interest.user_id, ((((article_value_materialized.score)::numeric)::double precision / (( SELECT max(article_value_materialized_1.score) AS max FROM article_value_materialized article_value_materialized_1) + (1)::double precision)) * ((article_interest.interest / (( SELECT max(article_interest_1.interest) AS max FROM article_interest article_interest_1) + (1)::numeric)))::double precision) AS score FROM ((article_value_materialized JOIN article_interest ON ((article_interest.id = article_value_materialized.id))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT article_read_count.article_id, article_read_count.user_id FROM article_read_count WHERE (article_read_count.user_id IS NOT NULL)) read ON (((read.article_id = article_interest.id) AND (read.user_id = article_interest.user_id)))) WHERE ((read.article_id IS NULL) AND (article_value_materialized.score > (0)::double precision));

table.name: article_value_materialized
table.viewSql: SELECT article_value_view.id, article_value_view.title, article_value_view.created_at, article_value_view.score, article_value_view.base_score1, article_value_view.base_score2, article_value_view.boost_score1, article_value_view.boost_score2 FROM article_value_view;

table.name: article_value_view
table.viewSql: SELECT scores.id, scores.title, scores.created_at, (((scores.base_score1 + (scores.base_score2)::double precision) + (scores.boost_score1)::double precision) + scores.boost_score2) AS score, scores.base_score1, scores.base_score2, scores.boost_score1, scores.boost_score2 FROM ( SELECT article.id, article.title, article.created_at, LEAST(COALESCE(d1.donation_sum, (0)::double precision), (2000)::double precision) AS base_score1, LEAST((((COALESCE(r1.read_2_days, (0)::numeric) / (5000)::numeric) * ((2 + pd.post_days))::numeric) / ((1 + pd.post_days))::numeric), (1000)::numeric) AS base_score2, ((100 * COALESCE(lc2.like_30_mins, (0)::bigint)) + (500 * COALESCE(d2.donation_30_mins, (0)::bigint))) AS boost_score1, ((GREATEST(((400)::double precision - ((2)::double precision * fc.since_comment)), (0)::double precision) + GREATEST(((600)::double precision - ((3)::double precision * fl.since_like)), (0)::double precision)) + GREATEST(((1000)::double precision - ((5)::double precision * fd.since_donate)), (0)::double precision)) AS boost_score2 FROM ((((((((article LEFT JOIN ( SELECT transaction.target_id, sum(((1000)::double precision / power((((CURRENT_DATE - (transaction.created_at)::date) + 1))::double precision, (2)::double precision))) AS donation_sum FROM transaction WHERE ((transaction.purpose = 'donation'::text) AND (transaction.currency = 'HKD'::text)) GROUP BY transaction.target_id) d1 ON ((d1.target_id = article.id))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT article_read_count.article_id, sum(article_read_count.read_time) AS read_2_days FROM article_read_count WHERE (article_read_count.updated_at >= (now() - '2 days'::interval)) GROUP BY article_read_count.article_id) r1 ON ((r1.article_id = article.id))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT appreciation.reference_id, sum(appreciation.amount) AS like_30_mins FROM appreciation WHERE (appreciation.created_at >= (now() - '00:30:00'::interval)) GROUP BY appreciation.reference_id) lc2 ON ((lc2.reference_id = article.id))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT transaction.target_id, count(transaction.id) AS donation_30_mins FROM transaction WHERE ((transaction.purpose = 'donation'::text) AND (transaction.currency = 'HKD'::text) AND (transaction.created_at >= (now() - '00:30:00'::interval))) GROUP BY transaction.target_id) d2 ON ((d2.target_id = article.id))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT article_1.id, (CURRENT_DATE - (article_1.created_at)::date) AS post_days FROM article article_1) pd ON ((pd.id = article.id))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT transaction.target_id, (date_part('epoch'::text, (now() - min(transaction.created_at))) / (60)::double precision) AS since_donate FROM transaction WHERE ((transaction.purpose = 'donation'::text) AND (transaction.currency = 'HKD'::text) AND (transaction.created_at >= (now() - '30 days'::interval))) GROUP BY transaction.target_id) fd ON ((fd.target_id = article.id))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT comment.article_id, (date_part('epoch'::text, (now() - min(comment.created_at))) / (60)::double precision) AS since_comment FROM comment WHERE (comment.created_at >= (now() - '30 days'::interval)) GROUP BY comment.article_id) fc ON ((fc.article_id = article.id))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT appreciation.reference_id, (date_part('epoch'::text, (now() - min(appreciation.created_at))) / (60)::double precision) AS since_like FROM appreciation WHERE (appreciation.created_at >= (now() - '30 days'::interval)) GROUP BY appreciation.reference_id) fl ON ((fl.reference_id = article.id)))) scores;

table.name: featured_comment_materialized
table.viewSql: SELECT comment_score.id, comment_score.uuid, comment_score.author_id, comment_score.article_id, comment_score.parent_comment_id, comment_score.content, comment_score.state, comment_score.pinned, comment_score.created_at, comment_score.updated_at, comment_score.quotation_start, comment_score.quotation_end, comment_score.quotation_content, comment_score.reply_to, comment_score.remark, comment_score.upvoted_id, comment_score.upvote_count, comment_score.downvoted_id, comment_score.downvote_count, comment_score.score FROM ( SELECT comment.id, comment.uuid, comment.author_id, comment.article_id, comment.parent_comment_id, comment.content, comment.state, comment.pinned, comment.created_at, comment.updated_at, comment.quotation_start, comment.quotation_end, comment.quotation_content, comment.reply_to, comment.remark, upvotes.upvoted_id, upvotes.upvote_count, downvotes.downvoted_id, downvotes.downvote_count, ((((COALESCE(upvotes.upvote_count, (0)::bigint) - COALESCE(downvotes.downvote_count, (0)::bigint)) + 1))::double precision * sqrt(((COALESCE(upvotes.upvote_count, (0)::bigint) + COALESCE(downvotes.downvote_count, (0)::bigint)))::double precision)) AS score FROM ((comment LEFT JOIN ( SELECT action.target_id AS upvoted_id, COALESCE(count(action.id), (0)::bigint) AS upvote_count FROM action_comment action WHERE (action.action = 'up_vote'::text) GROUP BY action.target_id) upvotes ON ((comment.id = upvotes.upvoted_id))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT action.target_id AS downvoted_id, COALESCE(count(action.id), (0)::bigint) AS downvote_count FROM action_comment action WHERE (action.action = 'down_vote'::text) GROUP BY action.target_id) downvotes ON ((comment.id = downvotes.downvoted_id))) WHERE (comment.parent_comment_id IS NULL)) comment_score WHERE ((comment_score.pinned = true) OR (comment_score.score > (20)::double precision));

table.name: tag_count_materialized
table.viewSql: SELECT tag_count_view.id, tag_count_view.content, tag_count_view.created_at, tag_count_view.updated_at, tag_count_view.recent_count, tag_count_view.count, tag_count_view.last_used, tag_count_view.tag_score FROM tag_count_view;

table.name: tag_count_view
table.viewSql: SELECT tag.id, tag.content, tag.created_at, tag.updated_at, a1.recent_count, a2.count, a3.last_used, (((COALESCE(a1.recent_count, (0)::bigint) * ((a3.last_used >= (now() - '72:00:00'::interval)))::integer))::double precision * COALESCE(b.boost, (1)::real)) AS tag_score FROM ((((tag LEFT JOIN ( SELECT count(article_tag.id) AS recent_count, article_tag.tag_id FROM article_tag WHERE (article_tag.created_at >= (now() - '30 days'::interval)) GROUP BY article_tag.tag_id) a1 ON ((tag.id = a1.tag_id))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT count(article_tag.id) AS count, article_tag.tag_id FROM article_tag GROUP BY article_tag.tag_id) a2 ON ((tag.id = a2.tag_id))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT max(article_tag.created_at) AS last_used, article_tag.tag_id FROM article_tag GROUP BY article_tag.tag_id) a3 ON ((tag.id = a3.tag_id))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tag_boost.boost, tag_boost.tag_id FROM tag_boost) b ON ((tag.id = b.tag_id)));

table.name: transaction_delta_view
table.viewSql: SELECT "user".id AS user_id, trx1.amount AS delta, trx1.id, trx1.amount, trx1.currency, trx1.state, trx1.purpose, trx1.provider, trx1.provider_tx_id, trx1.sender_id, trx1.recipient_id, trx1.target_id, trx1.target_type, trx1.created_at, trx1.updated_at FROM ("user" JOIN ( SELECT transaction.id, transaction.amount, transaction.currency, transaction.state, transaction.purpose, transaction.provider, transaction.provider_tx_id, transaction.sender_id, transaction.recipient_id, transaction.target_id, transaction.target_type, transaction.created_at, transaction.updated_at FROM transaction) trx1 ON ((trx1.recipient_id = "user".id))) UNION SELECT "user".id AS user_id, ((0)::numeric - trx2.amount) AS delta, trx2.id, trx2.amount, trx2.currency, trx2.state, trx2.purpose, trx2.provider, trx2.provider_tx_id, trx2.sender_id, trx2.recipient_id, trx2.target_id, trx2.target_type, trx2.created_at, trx2.updated_at FROM ("user" JOIN ( SELECT transaction.id, transaction.amount, transaction.currency, transaction.state, transaction.purpose, transaction.provider, transaction.provider_tx_id, transaction.sender_id, transaction.recipient_id, transaction.target_id, transaction.target_type, transaction.created_at, transaction.updated_at FROM transaction) trx2 ON ((trx2.sender_id = "user".id)));

table.name: user_reader_materialized
table.viewSql: SELECT user_reader_view.id, user_reader_view.uuid, user_reader_view.user_name, user_reader_view.display_name, user_reader_view.description, user_reader_view.avatar, user_reader_view.email, user_reader_view.email_verified, user_reader_view.mobile, user_reader_view.password_hash, user_reader_view.read_speed, user_reader_view.base_gravity, user_reader_view.curr_gravity, user_reader_view.language, user_reader_view.role, user_reader_view.state, user_reader_view.created_at, user_reader_view.updated_at, user_reader_view.recent_appreciators, user_reader_view.recent_reads, user_reader_view.author_score FROM user_reader_view;

table.name: user_reader_view
table.viewSql: SELECT "user".id, "user".uuid, "user".user_name, "user".display_name, "user".description, "user".avatar, "user".email, "user".email_verified, "user".mobile, "user".password_hash, "user".read_speed, "user".base_gravity, "user".curr_gravity, "user".language, "user".role, "user".state, "user".created_at, "user".updated_at, a.recent_appreciators, r.recent_reads, (((COALESCE(a.recent_appreciators, (0)::bigint) * COALESCE(r.recent_reads, (0)::bigint)))::double precision * COALESCE(b.boost, (1)::real)) AS author_score FROM ((("user" LEFT JOIN ( SELECT count(DISTINCT ts.sender_id) AS recent_appreciators, ar.author_id FROM (transaction_obsolete ts JOIN article ar ON ((ts.reference_id = ar.id))) WHERE ((ts.created_at >= (now() - '6 mons'::interval)) AND (ts.purpose = 'appreciate'::text)) GROUP BY ar.author_id) a ON ((a.author_id = "user".id))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT count(DISTINCT a1.user_id) AS recent_reads, a2.author_id FROM (article_read a1 JOIN article a2 ON ((a1.article_id = a2.id))) WHERE (a1.created_at >= (now() - '6 mons'::interval)) GROUP BY a2.author_id) r ON ((r.author_id = "user".id))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_boost.boost, user_boost.user_id FROM user_boost) b ON (("user".id = b.user_id)));
